title: How to Open Polymath Cd Package

steps.headline: Get your MARCH'S POLYMATH CD from your local music store or direct order.
Remove the plastic wrap, using sharp tools such as cutters.
Cut or tear the CD paper wrap along the thread-stitched lines on the side of your package.
steps.description: Do it very carefully to avoid damage.

steps.headline: Unfold the CD paper wrap.
steps.description: The backside of the paper contain lyrics and credits while the front side contains the POLYMATH artwork. The front side could be a fully functional poster.

steps.headline: Remove the small MARCH POLYMATH sticker on the front side and the track list sticker if you wish.
Stick it on the CD case or anywhere else.
Read the lyrics and credits from the CD paper.
Put the CD paper anywhere you like as a poster.
Listen and Headbang to MARCH tunes.

text: Get your MARCH'S POLYMATH CD from your local music store or direct order.  Remove the plastic wrap, using sharp tools such as cutters.  Cut or tear the CD paper wrap along the thread-stitched lines on the side of your package. Do it very carefully to avoid damage. Pull the CD case out.  Unfold the CD paper wrap. The backside of the paper contain lyrics and credits while the front side contains the POLYMATH artwork. The front side could be a fully functional poster. Remove the small MARCH POLYMATH sticker on the front side and the track list sticker if you wish.  Stick it on the CD case or anywhere else.  Read the lyrics and credits from the CD paper.  Put the CD paper anywhere you like as a poster.  Listen and Headbang to MARCH tunes.
